This method of the birthdayGiftSquare gives 100$ to the arriving player on the instance of birthdayGiftSquare class.

Applies the arrival procedure of a cab square.
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.deedSquare
This method applies the proper process to the arriving player to the deed square.
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.drawCardSquare
This method of drawCardSquare gives a card to the arriving player according to the card type of the square that is either chance or community chest
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.go2jailSquare
This method of the go2JailSquare takes the arriving player and places him inside jail.
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.hollandTunnelSquare
This method of the hollandTunnelSquare class takes the arriving player from one end of the holland tunnel to the other end.
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.incomeTaxSquare
This method of the incomeTaxSquare asks if the input player wants to pay 10% of his/her balance or pay 200$ to the pool.
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.luxuryTaxSquare
This method takes in player and game as arguments and makes 75$ payment from the pool of the input game to the arriving player who is basically the input for this procedure.
arrival_proc(Player, Game) - Method in class boardrelated.RailroadTrackSquare
The arrival process of the track change squares that makes the payment from the arriving player to the owner.

This procedure sets the reverse movement of a player to true.
